headline: XLE Surged 21.6% This Year as Oil Majors Navigate $64 Crude Reality
summary: The Energy Select Sector SPDR Fund (NYSEARCA:XLE) has surged 21.6% year to date as markets pivot from energy transition rhetoric toward energy security concerns. This performance reflects investor confidence that the fund’s $33 billion portfolio of oil majors can navigate volatile crude prices and deliver returns even when commodity markets remain unpredictable. The Oil Price ... XLE Surged 21.6% This Year as Oil Majors Navigate $64 Crude Reality

headline: Exxon Mobil Corporation (XOM) is Attracting Investor Attention: Here is What You Should Know
summary: Recently, Zacks.com users have been paying close attention to Exxon (XOM). This makes it worthwhile to examine what the stock has in store.
